original_text: If you are wise, it will help you in many ways. But if you think that you do not need wisdom, you will bring trouble on yourself. If you are wise, it will help you in many ways. But if you think that you do not need wisdom, you will bring trouble on yourself.
korean_text: 네가 만일 지혜로우면 그 지혜가 네게 유익할 것이나 네가 만일 거만하면 너 홀로 해를 당하리라

sentences.original_text: it will help you in many ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여러 가지 방법으로 너를 도울 것이다

sentences.original_text: But if you think that you do not need wisdom
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 네가 지혜가 필요 없다고 생각한다면

sentences.original_text: you will bring trouble on yourself
